channel.title: Kalki on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)
channel.description: Recent content in Kalki on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)

item.title: The Kalki Paradox | Divine Intervention and the Pattern of Hindu Resistance
item.description: An exploration of why every Hindu revolutionary movement has failed, and what this reveals about the nature of divine intervention in human affairs
